page.title: 10Scouting
page.content: Castle Cary & area has a thriving {Scout group,}Scouts being boys aged between 10\ & 15. Younger boys can join{Beavers}or{Cubs,}and those older join{Ventures. At a typical meeting we start with inspection & flagbreak, and then play a game or do training. In summer we usually play the{Wide Game.}In this game half of the Scouts run and touch the Roundhouse, and the other half try to touch them before they get back to the Scout Hut. Then we have the closing ceremony and lower the flag before we go home. Scouts also learn about knots, camping, first aid, hiking, survival and many other things. Our troop has a marching band with the{Guides,}and we play at fetes, parades & carnivals.
